questions.question: What is the main focus of energy optimization?
options: Using more time to complete tasks
Maintaining steady productivity and well-being through healthy habits
questions.explanation: Energy optimization is about using your energy wisely throughout the day to stay productive and feel good.

questions.question: Which of the following helps boost physical energy?
questions.explanation: Exercise increases circulation and endorphins, which support higher energy levels and alertness.

questions.question: How does hydration affect energy?
options: Staying hydrated improves mental clarity and prevents fatigue
It has no effect on energy
questions.explanation: Dehydration can cause fatigue and reduce cognitive function, so drinking water regularly supports consistent energy.

questions.question: Which eating habit is recommended for better energy management?
options: Skipping lunch for more work time
Consuming balanced meals with whole foods
questions.explanation: Balanced meals help regulate blood sugar and prevent energy crashes, supporting sustained focus and energy.

questions.question: How does energy optimization support learning?
options: By focusing on study only at night
By aligning study tasks with your high-energy periods
By reducing the amount of material to learn
questions.explanation: Matching challenging study tasks with times when your energy is highest improves focus, memory, and learning quality.
